title: Marine Ecology
description: An overview of the physical forces and biotic interactions structuring marine communities and of the major threats to these communities
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: BIOS 2300 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOS 2310 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOL 2335 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or BIOL 2337 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
